languages.text: {n}Помолчав, сержант тяжело кивает.{/n} "Вы нам, Ваш высокобродие, в трудный час {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}помогли{/d}. Потому сделаю, как велите. Почему вы этих дармоедов спасти хотите, я не пойму. Но, может, не все они заслуживают смерти".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сержант, нахмурившись, умолкает. Затем, собравшись, кивает.{/n} "Вы нам, Ваш высокобродь, в трудный час помогли. Потому сделаю, как велите. Почему вы этих дармоедов спасти хотите, я не пойму. Но может, не все они заслуживают смерти".

languages.text: {n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."
languages.original_text: {n}Помолчав, сержант тяжело кивает.{/n} "Вы нам, Ваш высокобродие, в трудный час {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}помогли{/d}. Потому сделаю, как велите. Почему вы этих дармоедов спасти хотите, я не пойму. Но, может, не все они заслуживают смерти".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sergeant pauses before nodding.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you helped us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these layabouts, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

{n}The sergeant pauses before nodding.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you helped us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these layabouts, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

{n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you helped us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

{n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you helped us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

{n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you helped us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

{n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you helped us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

languages.text: {n}Der Sergeant hält kurz inne, ehe er heftig nickt.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, {mf|Sir|Madam}, Ihr habt uns {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}geholfen{/d}, als es düster für uns aussah. Ich werde tun, was Ihr sagt. Ich begreife zwar nicht, warum Ihr diese Parasiten retten wollt. Doch vielleicht haben sie nicht alle den Tod verdient."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sergeant hält kurz inne, ehe er heftig nickt.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, {mf|Sir|Madam}, Ihr habt uns geholfen, als es düster für uns aussah. Ich werde tun, was Ihr sagt. Ich begreife zwar nicht, warum Ihr diese Parasiten retten wollt. Doch vielleicht haben sie nicht alle den Tod verdient."

languages.text: {n}Le sergent s'interrompt avant d'acquiescer vigoureusement.{/n} « Vous nous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}aidés{/d} quand la situation partait en vrille... Je ferai ce que vous me demandez. Je pige pas bien pourquoi vous voulez sauver ces cafards, mais peut-être bien que tous méritent pas la mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent s'interrompt avant d'acquiescer vigoureusement.{/n} « Vous nous avez aidés quand la situation partait en vrille... Je ferai ce que vous me demandez. Je pige pas bien pourquoi vous voulez sauver ces cafards, mais peut-être bien que tous méritent pas la mort. »

languages.text: {n}军士顿了顿，然后沉重地点点头。{/n}“大人，当我们身处险境的时候，是您{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}救{/d}了我们。我会按照您说的做。我不明白您为什么要救这群吸血鬼，但或许，他们并不是所有人都该死。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

traits.locale_text: {n}军士顿了顿，然后沉重地点点头。{/n}“大人，当我们身处险境的时候，是您救了我们。我会按照您说的做。我不明白您为什么要救这群吸血鬼，但或许，他们并不是所有人都该死。”

languages.text: {n}軍曹は立ち止まり、大きくうなずく。{/n}「陛下、我々が苦境にあった時、あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}我々をお助けくださった{/d}。あなたに従おう。なぜあなたがこの寄生虫どもを救いたがるのか、私には理解できない。しかし、奴らが皆死に値するわけではないのかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹は立ち止まり、大きくうなずく。{/n}「閣下、我々が苦境にあった時、あなたは我々をお助けくださった。あなたに従おう。なぜあなたがこの寄生虫どもを救いたがるのか、私には理解できない。しかし、奴らが皆死に値するわけではないのかもしれない」

languages.text: {n}El sargento hace una pausa antes de asentir profundamente.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, usted nos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}ayudó{/d} cuando las cosas iban mal para nosotros. Haré lo que dice. No entiendo por qué quiere salvar a estos parásitos, pero quizá no todos merezcan la muerte».
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento hace una pausa antes de asentir profundamente.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, usted nos ayudó cuando las cosas iban mal para nosotros. Haré lo que dice. No entiendo por qué quiere salvar a estos parásitos. Pero quizá no todos merezcan la muerte».

languages.text: {n}Çavuş, bir süre duraksayıp başını ağır ağır yukarı aşağı sallıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, umutlarımızın tükendiği anda bize {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}yardım eli uzattınız{/d}. Dediğinizi yapacağım. Bu asalakları niye kurtarmak istediğinizi anlamıyorum ama belki içlerinde ölümü hak etmeyenler de vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant pauses before nodding heavily.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped{/d} us when things looked grim for us. I'll do as you say. Why you want to save these parasites, that I don't understand. But maybe not all of them deserve death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuş, bir süre duraksayıp ağır ağır başını sallıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri efendim, işimiz bitti diye düşünürken bize yardım ettiniz. Dediğinizi yapacağım. Neden bu tufeylileri kurtarmak istiyorsunuz bilmiyorum ama belki de hepsi ölümü hak etmiyordur."
